summary: Gurus Are Quietly Stockpiling This Undervalued AI Crypto Gem – What’s the Deal?
title: Gurus Are Quietly Stockpiling This Undervalued AI Crypto Gem – What’s the Deal?
content: When it comes to trading and investing in the cryptocurrency markets, gaining an advantage over your competitors could make the difference between racking up major profits or taking hard losses. That’s why many crypto veterans have recently turned their attention to an under-the-radar AI crypto startup called yPredict.

While still relatively unknown to the general public, yPredict has caught the eye of industry experts who are steadily accumulating the project’s native token ahead of its upcoming launch. But what exactly does yPredict offer and why are crypto gurus making moves to invest now?

yPredict seeks to be a gateway to advanced AI crypto analytics powered by artificial intelligence (AI) and machine learning. At its core is the ERC-20 utility token, $YPRED, which provides access to the platform’s paid services.

Despite its low mainstream visibility up to this point, yPredict is generating a swell of interest within crypto trading communities by unveiling the pilot versions of its AI cryptocurrency scanning and tracking tools this year.
The AI crypto startup also opened up an AI-powered backlink estimator tool to the public for a limited time, receiving over 5,000 requests in 24 hours.
This demand even after a preview of yPredict’s AI crypto offerings has industry leaders taking notice and acquiring the $YPRED token through the ongoing public presale.
Visit yPredict Now
Industry experts likely recognize the potential in yPredict’s suite of AI crypto and machine learning technologies.
The project’s whitepaper states that yPredict utilizes data analytics abilities exceeding human limitations to identify trends, patterns, and key understandings for cryptocurrency trading.

For instance, yPredict’s core AI crypto platform intends to provide trading signals, price predictions, sentiment analysis, pattern recognition, and other tools to give users an advantage in the volatile crypto space. The AI crypto startup has begun rolling out access to these features through a waitlist.

Additionally, yPredict launched a model called Alt_Pump_001, designed to detect overlooked altcoins positioned for exponential growth. Usually carrying a monthly subscription cost of over $1000, the model is free for presale buyers who purchase a minimum of $500 in $YPRED tokens.

The AI crypto platform also offers unlimited access to its backlink estimator tool as part of its presale perks. This tool seeks to optimize search engine optimization (SEO) strategies by determining the ideal backlink profile to rank target keywords.
Given the immense value of these AI crypto capabilities for crypto projects, investors are eager to gain access by buying $YPRED.

“I’m bullish on yPredict due to its fair token distribution and allocation,” said crypto analyst and YouTuber Michael Wrubel. Other experts likely hold similar sentiments as they acquire $YPRED before it becomes mainstream.

As insider interest in yPredict continues mounting, so too does demand for the platform’s native $YPRED token via the ongoing public presale. yPredict has raised over $4.8 million and counting as stakeholders eagerly acquire $YPRED ahead of the full launch.

Yet this surge of activity suggests that the window of opportunity is beginning to close. With 80% of the total token supply allocated to the presale, the inventory available at exclusive presale rates is limited. Once the allotment sells out, exchanges will list $YPRED at higher market prices post-launch.

Those purchasing $YPRED tokens can realize potential returns on their positions as broader awareness takes hold. As one of the perks of participating in the presale, early buyers will also gain privileged access to yPredict’s AI-powered crypto utilities before the public launch.

However, these benefits will not last indefinitely. As the presale progresses, the remaining token supply diminishes by the day. The current presale period could conclude very soon given the accelerating demand.
